Events that occurred on 8 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1925 - Father Robert Murray, friend of J.R.R. Tolkien and his family, is born.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 230.
1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Rhona Beare.
1994 - Actor Anthony Boyle is born.
2008 - Forodrim's 36th birthday celebration.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
